search_recipe_on_reddit.name: search_recipe_on_reddit
search_recipe_on_reddit.description: Use the '/tools/bing/searchv2' API to search for the cherry melomel recipe by StormBeforeDawn on Reddit's r/mead.

retrieve_recipe_content.name: retrieve_recipe_content
retrieve_recipe_content.description: Use the '/tools/bing/load_pagev2' API with a query parameter set to 'cherry melomel recipe by StormBeforeDawn, not updated after July 14, 2022' to retrieve the content of the Reddit post found in the previous step.

extract_cherry_quantity.name: extract_cherry_quantity
extract_cherry_quantity.description: Analyze the content retrieved from the Reddit post to find the quantity of whole cherries with pits needed for a 10-gallon batch.
